title: Network Pentesting With RaspberryPi4
description: Targeted packet sniffing, Wifi cracking, MITM attacks, Server side attacks using Metasploit and client side attacks using BeEf.

title: Ideate
description: A simple web app where users can look for inspirational ideas among different categories and also put forth their unique content. Built with Python + Django and PostgreSQL. Deployed with Heroku.

title: Pathfinder
description: Interactive visualisations of popular pathfinding algorithms like Dijkstra's algorithm, DFS and BFS in the browser. Built with Vue.js and Vuetify. Deployed with Netlify.

title: PyQuiz
description: A minimal yet robust API for quiz applications built with Django and the Django REST Framework.

title: The Lazy Chef
description: A web app to find interesting recipes based on the items in your kitchen. Built with Vue.js and Vuetify.

title: Restaurant Recommendation Engine
description: A content based recommendation engine that uses cosine correlation and sources data using the Zomato API.
